titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the period commencing October 11, 1987, and ending October 17, 1987, as "National Angel Plane Week".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/7/1987--Introduced. Designates the week of October 11 through October 17, 1987, as National Angel Plane Week in recognition of the Angel Planes, a group of airline pilots who transport blood, organs, and persons in need of medical treatment.
